name: Lands Of Peace
description:
the secret Lands of Peace...adventures await you!

It's a ONE-DEVELOPER sci-fi adult game, so if you play, please keep it in your mind. You can message me on Steam Community or on my Discord Channel, if you have any suggestions/wishes or bugs. The Lands of Peace is in Early Access, because Chapter 1 is released and the game will be updated automatically with new chapters in the future. It's a free game. I dreamed this game and started works about 1 year ago.

Adult Content:
- Nudity
- Sexual Scenes
